F

factoryGiftQueue - Variable in class cds.java.project.actors.Reindeer
Queue in which presents are stored at the factory level; the reindeer takes raw presents from it and then packs them
factoryGrid - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
An instance of the SimpleBooleanGrid class, the grid of the toy factory
factoryGridSize - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
Size of the toy factory grid
factoryIndex - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
Index of the current factory
fillMatrixWithDefaultValue() - Method in class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleBooleanGrid
Private method that fills the matrix with a value of false; it makes use of an enhanced for loop and a method from the Arrays class that resides in the java.util package
fillMatrixWithValue(T) - Method in class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleGrid
Private method that fills the matrix with a default value given as a parameter; it makes use of an enhanced for loop and a method from the Arrays class that resides in the java.util package
findValidPositionToSpawnElf() - Method in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
Method that searches the grid for a position in which there is no elf and returns it so that a worker can be put there to perform its job; we start in a random position (we generate a random coordinate X and a random coordinate Y) and search to the end of the matrix; if we find a good value, we mark it as we will put an elf in it and then we return it; if no valid posiution has been found, we start another search, from the start of the matrix towards the random position; we have the certitude that we will finally get an empty position because the number of elves is way smaller than the number of positions in a troy factory grid
